text: Enver Hadžihasanović (7 July 1950 – 16 December 2024) was a Bosnian general and convicted war criminal. He was the chief of staff of the Army of the Republic of Bosnia and Herzegovina. He was Commander of the 3rd Corps. Hadžihasanović died on 16 December 2024 at the age of 74.Preminuo general Armije RBiH Enver Hadžihasanović ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Bosnia and Herzegovina people Category:Generals Category:War criminals
title: Enver Hadžihasanović
